SEARCH

Class EssayHelper

java.lang.Object
EssayHelper
public class EssayHelper extends Object
Program is an essay helper that would give the user important information about an uploaded text. The user may run the program after adding a text file containing the text that they want information about.
Author:
annaq

      Returns:
